citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 13:40. No one was
present at premises. The inspector spoke with Mr. Council by phone. He stated that he was not at premises at the time of
inspection. Inspector departed premises at 13:50.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 13:40. No one was 
present at premises. The inspector spoke with Mr. Council by phone. He stated that he was not at premises at the time of 
inspection. Inspector departed premises at 13:50. 
 
 
End Section
